remarks: Detach a conjunction of truths in a biconditional.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Nov-2012.)
statement:
mpbir2and.1 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
mpbir2and.2 $e |- ( ph -> th ) $.
mpbir2and.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ( ch /\ th ) ) ) $.
mpbir2and $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
